channel.title: Feedback Loops on Will Hipson
channel.description: Recent content in Feedback Loops on Will Hipson

item.title: Modeling Motivation and Emotion using Feedback Loops
item.description: If you’re anything like me, you probably set a lot of goals. Whether it’s to finish a paper by the end of the summer or to spend more time with friends and family, goals are what help motivate us to do something. Goals are also intimately tied to our feelings. You may have had the experience of falling behind in your goals, which made you upset, but ultimately motivated you to step up your efforts.
